snippet: Doug Shafer, the program’s defensive coordinator the past four years, succeeds Doug Marrone, who resigned to become coach of the Buffalo Bills.
abstract: Syracuse promotes defensive coordinator Scott Shafer to head football coach.
lead_paragraph: Doug Shafer, the program’s defensive coordinator the past four years, succeeds Doug Marrone, who resigned to become coach of the Buffalo Bills.

headline.main: Defensive Coordinator Promoted to Coach at Syracuse
headline.print_headline: Defensive Coordinator Promoted to Coach at Syracuse
